Morningside Panthers 2009 Premiership Reunion

Official Schedule

1:00pm Saturday June 15th, 2019 Commencing

The 2009 Premiership

In what was a repeat of the 2003 Premiership decider, red hot favourites Morningside took on the fast-finishing Mount Gravatt in the battle of Brisbane's South-East. Both clubs entered with that winning feel about them with neither having lost in the previous two months to September 2009. Morningside entered fresh and desperate to amend for the previous years fade out.

2019 QAFL Morningside Vs Mt Gravatt

Jack Esplen Oval - 2pm Start

Proudly Sponsored by BMC Capital Investments

Get on down to Esplen Oval to watch the 2019 Morningside Panthers take on their 2009 Premiership Rivals, Mt Gravatt Vultures, in the QAFL.

Book Now! Donate To Premiership Reunion Fund

2009 Premiership Reunion

Semi-Pro Brewery, Manilla Street, East Brisbane, Queensland

Proudly Sponsored by BMC Capital Investments

Join in what promises to be a fantastic get together to celebrate the trails and tribulations of the 2009 AFLQ Premiership Season. Hosted by Morningside Panther's very own Prince of Banter, Shaun Mugavin from Club Star Entertainment, at the charismatic Semi-Pro Brewery at East Brisbane. Get ready to relive all the action and excitement of the big day for both Senior and Reserve Grade teams. Ticket includes preshipped merchandise including a copy of each respective games, a pack of playing cards of each team member and coaching staff and other possibilities for purchase on the night.
